激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":5},"params":"${ const rainwaterMult = 1.5; let careApplied = 0; store.state.农场.field.forEach(row => { row.forEach(cell => { if (cell !== null && cell.type === 'crop' && cell.cache.careWeight > 0) { const geneStats = store.getters['农场/cropGeneStats'](cell.crop, cell.fertilizer); store.state.农场.careCanMax.forEach(elem => { if (geneStats.珍贵植物[elem] && cell.珍贵植物[elem] < geneStats.珍贵植物[elem].max) { const crop = store.state.农场.crop[cell.crop]; const growDiv = Math.sqrt((cell.giant ? crop.giantGrow : crop.grow) / 10)  \\cdot  8; careApplied += \\text{向上取整}((geneStats.珍贵植物[elem].max - cell.珍贵植物[elem])  \\cdot  growDiv / geneStats.珍贵植物[elem].amount); } }); } }); }); return [\\text{向上取整}(careApplied  \\cdot  rainwaterMult), rainwaterMult, careApplied]; }$","description":"$[]$","formula":"$[formatInt(params[0]), formatNum(params[1]  \\cdot  100)]$","disabled":"$store.state.cryolab.农场.激活的卡片 || params[2] <= 0 || store.state.currency.雨水.value < params[0]$","trigger":"${ store.dispatch('currency/spend', { feature: '农场', name: '雨水', amount: params[0] }); store.state.农场.field.forEach((row, y) => { row.forEach((cell, x) => { if (cell !== null && cell.type === 'crop' && cell.cache.careWeight > 0) { const geneStats = store.getters['农场/cropGeneStats'](cell.crop, cell.fertilizer); store.state.农场.careCanMax.forEach(elem => { if (geneStats.珍贵植物[elem] && cell.珍贵植物[elem] < geneStats.珍贵植物[elem].max) { store.commit('农场/updateFieldCare', { x, y, key: elem, value: geneStats.珍贵植物[elem].max }); } }); } }); }); store.commit('stat/add', { feature: '农场', name: '珍贵植物', value: params[2] }); }$"}
